author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1130 Use maven-jar-plugin to create a o-p-j-tests.jar to share base TestCase classes across modules

author: rickhall
msg: The default configuration file now refers to the correct property
name for setting the framework's beginning start level. (FELIX-1198)

author: rickhall
msg: Merging of fragment import package and required bundle declarations
into the host bundle was faulty and could result in a class cast
exception. The code was using a map to merge the dependencies, but
was using values of an incorrect type. (FELIX-1197)
